sen.e: According to Article on March 24, 1185 of "The Azuma Kagami"(a Japanese medieval history book), both Taira no Tokiko (her Buddhist name is 'Nii no Ama') holding the sacred sword, "Amakumo no Tsurugi" in her hand and 'Azechi no Tsubone' holding boy-Emperor 'Antoku' in her arms drowned themselves.
